Jun 13, 2019

This post will be brief. Recall that Mahowald’s family is detected in the -line of the Adams spectral sequence by ; these are permanent cycles for . Under the map , the element maps to and maps to for .

I just want to record the observation that is detected by . The proof follows this paper. It contains the construction of a map from a modified May spectral sequence (where the filtration of is ) to the slice spectral sequence for . It is shown that maps to . It follows that is sent to . Since the only differentials in the slice spectral sequence for are determined by

for , we find that does indeed survive the slice spectral sequence for . Consequently, by arguing as in Theorem 6.3 of the cited paper, we find that is detected by .
